entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
